message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
Meet me halfway, Alice. Let's see if we can do better than that.
You think you can do better than me? Bring it on, Bob!
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, Bob. Don't get too comfortable!
You're getting closer to my target, Alice. But I'm not there yet.
You think you can turn the tables on me, Bob? I'm not done yet!
It's time to meet in the middle, Bob. Let's call it a day!
You're getting closer, but I'm still not satisfied. I want more.
You're not getting any closer to your target, Bob. I'm not backing down!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Let's make a deal before it's too late!
I'm taking a firmer stance, Alice. This is my best offer so far.
You're getting too greedy, Bob. I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. But don't think this is the final offer!
I'm getting close to my target, Alice. Don't make me go to the final round.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm not going to let you take the majority!
I'm not going down without a fight, Bob. Take it or leave it!
This is my final offer, Alice. Take it or we both walk away with nothing.
You've pushed me too far, Bob. I'd rather walk away with nothing than give you 9/10 of the money!
